Name: Badlands
Description: An auto racing game with guns set in a post-apocalyptic world

Name: Batman
Description: The player takes on the role of the Caped Crusader participating in scenes taken from the 1989 film of the same name . Scenes are varied and include a final confrontation with The Joker

Name: Battlezone
Description: A big hit for Atari , the player controls a tank from the point-of-view from inside the tank . Novel controls , game cabinet and graphics made this a standout

Name: Beat Head
Description: A competitive rhythm game . Never released into full production

Name: Beavis and Butt-Head
Description: A prototype of a game based on the animated TV series ; never released

Name: Black Widow
Description: The player is a spider at the middle of a web , trying to defend it from enemies

Name: Blasteroids
Description: Players blast asteroids and other targets and try to catch powerups to upgrade their weapons

Name: Boxing
Description: An unreleased black and white prototype of a boxing game

Name: Bradley Trainer
Description: A special-purpose version of Battlezone for the U.S. military . Players do not control the tank as in the original game , only the tank turret

Name: Breakout
Description: Players break down a wall at the top of the screen with a ball and paddle
